Nick, do you have a test case for this.

Dirk, I'm attaching 2 classes, which I moved out from my project to a 
standalone PDE project.
I've got the error stable reproducible: try to call refactoring/rename on 
method getIconImageDescriptor in Plugin.java. Just type anything (e.g. 
"getIconImageDescriptor2" as a new name) and click "preview" to see the 
internal error report in top panel.
Interesting effect: if I try to change resource bundle instanciation parameter 
to a shorter string (i.e. 
replace "com.tssap.selena.xml.rtframework.PluginResources" to "test") - the 
problem disappear, however I don't understand how could it relate...
looks like bug 40452 - i have a fix for it. will release for M3
